SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.options

Record Class Repetitions

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.dua3.utility.options.Repetitions
Record Components:
min - the minimum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to 0
max - the maximum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to min
public record Repetitions(int min, int max) extends Record
Represents a range of repetitions with a minimum and maximum value.

This record encapsulates constraints where the number of repetitions is bounded by the given minimum and maximum values. It also provides well-known constants for common repetition ranges and utility methods for creating specific repetition ranges.

Instances of this record are immutable.

  • Field Details

    • ZERO

      public static final Repetitions ZERO
      A constant representing a Repetitions instance with both minimum and maximum repetitions set to 0.

    • ZERO_OR_ONE

      public static final Repetitions ZERO_OR_ONE
      A predefined Repetitions instance representing a minimum of zero repetitions and a maximum of one repetition. This denotes an optional occurrence.

    • ZERO_OR_MORE

      public static final Repetitions ZERO_OR_MORE
      Represents a Repetitions instance allowing zero or more repetitions.

    • EXACTLY_ONE

      public static final Repetitions ONE_OR_MORE
      A predefined Repetitions instance representing one or more repetitions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Repetitions

      public Repetitions(int min, int max)
      Represents a range of repetitions defined by a minimum and a maximum value. Guarantees the constraints that the minimum value must not be negative and the maximum value must be greater than or equal to the minimum value.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum number of repetitions, must be zero or greater
      max - the maximum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to min
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if min is negative or max is less than min

  • Method Details

    • between

      public static Repetitions between(int min, int max)
      Creates a Repetitions instance with the specified minimum and maximum values.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to 0
      max - the maximum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to min
      Returns:
      a Repetitions instance representing the range [min, max]
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if min < 0 or max < min

    • exactly

      public static Repetitions exactly(int n)
      Creates a Repetitions instance where the minimum and maximum number of repetitions are exactly the same value.
      Parameters:
      n - the exact number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to 0
      Returns:
      a Repetitions instance with both minimum and maximum repetitions set to n

    • atLeast

      public static Repetitions atLeast(int n)
      Creates a Repetitions instance representing a range of repetitions with no upper limit and a specified minimum number of repetitions.
      Parameters:
      n - the minimum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to 0
      Returns:
      a Repetitions instance with the specified minimum repetitions and an unlimited maximum

    • atMost

      public static Repetitions atMost(int n)
      Creates a Repetitions instance representing a range with a maximum of n repetitions and a minimum of zero repetitions.
      Parameters:
      n - the maximum number of repetitions, must be greater than or equal to 0
      Returns:
      a Repetitions object with a minimum of 0 and the specified maximum of n
